name: Jupiter Moons: Mecha
description:
Enjoy complex Mech simulation in a single-player, deckbuilding, roguelike adventure. Change your Mech loadout to customize your card deck. Level up your pilot, explore countless card combinations, and discover powerful combos.

Features
Deck building - Assemble the perfect deck with an array of unique cards.

Roguelike gameplay - Missions, enemies, and items are procedurally generated. Each game run is unique.

Equipment management - Equip your Mech with various weapons and support items. Each item equipped adds new cards. Switch up your Mech loadout to assemble a unique deck.

Pilot skill tree - Level up your pilot and choose their skills. Combine skills with the right deck to create powerful combos. Experiment to discover new, exciting card combinations.

Campaign - Learn the origins of the ancient device corrupting the machines.

Tons of content - Choose one of four unique Mechs, plus more:
30+ different weapon types. All weapons and items drop randomly in classic ARPG style.
20+ support item types.
200+ unique cards.
20+ enemy Mechs and their corrupted variants.
6+ unique bosses and their corrupted variants.

Story
At the dawn of colonization of Jupiter's moons, megacorporations gave rise to metropolises—and to conflict. Cities were razed, with millions of lives lost. As the dust cleared, the corporations had all but completely abandoned the moons.
A wild frontier was born. Now home to the lawless and brave, things are slowly rebuilding. Immigrants from Sol's other planets arrive seeking a new life. Freelancing bounty hunters are all that remain to uphold a new, tenuous sense of order.

None knew that the bombing of Ganymede's capital had awakened something long in hibernation. A mysterious force emerged capable of corrupting machines. Affected machines merged with biological organisms, gaining consciousness and hostility toward people.

You play as a Mech pilot and freelancing bounty hunter. With the corruption spreading, more bounties mean more danger—and profit.
